something always brings me back to you it never takes too long no matter what i say or do ill still feel you here til the moment im gone you hold me without touch you keep me without chains i never wanted anything so much than to drown in your love and not feel your rain set me free leave me be i dont want to fall another moment into your gravity here i am and i stand so tall just the way im supposed to be but youre on to me and all over me you loved me cause im fragile when i thought that i was strong but you touch me for a little while and all my fragile strength is gone i live here on my knees as i try to make you see that youre everything i think i need here on the ground but youre neither friend nor foe though i cant seem to let you go the one thing that i still know is that youre keeping me down
